Hi, all!

I've posted this stuff at /r/kerbalspaceprogram over the last week and someone there reminded me I should x-post it here. I had a brainstorm two weekends ago and created KSP fridge magnets for my 2yo and 7yo:

http://imgur.com/gallery/9OlaJ

A lot of people ask if I'd be interested in selling them. I don't really see the cost/benefit working out for me with that, really, and you can make them yourself quite easily if you have a desktop printer and either magnetic tape or sheet magnets. Here's the image file I put together for a printout:

Here's an example of what your kids could build! (some folks on Reddit went and built this in the VAB with varying degrees of explosions)

Enjoy!

That's an awesome idea, very creative. Have some rep.

Edited January 26, 2015 by Alshain
Awesome idea! I might have to try this with my daughter at some point. Thanks for sharing!
